reviewText: I  W.I.S.H  this video had more to offer than it does but I don't see that it tells you very much about anything they do tell you very quickly how to measure fabric and then they move on to hanging these drapes and its all about windows only so IF your looking for a Decorating the WHOLE Home video this video is NOT for you  ????

I wish I had veiwed this video BEFORE I bought it because if I had I  would NOT have bought this. Very BORING and offers NOTHING at all to anyone trying to veiw a informative VHS about Decorating their home or homes  ??????  PLEASE don't waste your time AND money  !!!
